text: Proceedings for judicial review of mayoral actions shall be subject to and be in accordance with the District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act (§ 2-501 et seq.) applicable to "rule-making"; provided, however, that review of mayoral actions pursuant to § 42-1904.06 shall be subject to provisions applicable to "contested cases."
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 45-1876.

1973 Ed., § 5-1276.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-89, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-1901.01.

DC CODE § 42-1904.16
